name: Rettend - Inception (Playable Teaser)
description:
A little playable teaser for upcoming puzzle game, Rettend.

Controls:

  • WASD for movement.
  • Mouse for Camera.
  • Left Mouse button to zoom.
  • E to interact. 
  • Q to blink.
  • TAB to exit interaction.

    Be sure to join the official Discord server: https://discord.gg/xxG6CXE
